backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing a counter with methods to increment and query achievementPower.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two frontend features with affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten one‑sentence summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading main.tsx and setting the page title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app structure with header, theme toggle, language selector, sections, and wrapped by providers and error boundary.
frontend/src/components/AchievementCount: UI card showing achievement power, loading/error states, increment logic with temporary result messages.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that logs errors and shows a fallback UI with refresh action.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button with tooltip to switch light/dark theme using ThemeProvider and i18n labels.
frontend/src/hooks/useAchievementPower.t: React Query hooks for fetching and incrementing achievement power with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating backend actor based on identity and invalidating dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Exposes the current theme and helpers, falling back to a safe default if no ThemeProvider is present.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Supplies language state via context, loading initial language from storage or browser settings and persisting changes.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines translation types and provides English and Japanese text resources for the UI.
frontend/src/i18n/useI18n.ts: Returns the active language, setter, and translation object from the I18n context.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines warm-themed light/dark CSS variables and global typography/background styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/theme/ThemeProvider.tsx: Implements theme context with light/dark mode, persistence, and DOM class toggling.
frontend/src/theme/themeStorage.ts: Handles saving/loading theme preference and determining initial or system theme.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, extended colors from CSS variables, custom typography, animations, and utilities.
project_state.json: Defines the project's state and goals for rebuilding an Internet Computer–hosted achievement counter app, listing features, issues, and architectural notes.
